books.title: The Memory Police
books.author: Yoko Ogawa
books.description: On an unnamed island, objects are disappearing: first hats, then ribbons, birds, roses...

books.title: Rhinoceros and Other Plays
books.author: Eugène Ionesco
books.description: A rhinoceros suddenly appears in a small town, tramping through its peaceful streets.

books.title: Memento Mori
books.author: Muriel Spark
books.description: In late 1950s London, something uncanny besets a group of elderly friends.

books.title: Atlas of AI
books.author: Kate Crawford
books.description: The hidden costs of artificial intelligence--from natural resources and labor to privacy, equality, and freedom

books.title: Memoirs of a Geisha
books.author: Arthur Golden
books.description: A literary sensation and runaway bestseller, this brilliant debut novel presents with seamless authenticity and exquisite lyricism the true confessions of one of Japan's most celebrated geisha.

books.title: Life of Pi
books.author: Yann Martel
books.description: Life of Pi is a fantasy adventure novel by Yann Martel published in 2001. The protagonist, Piscine Molitor "Pi" Patel, a Tamil boy from Pondicherry, explores issues of spirituality and practicality from an early age. He survives 227 days after a shipwreck while stranded on a boat in the Pacific Ocean with a Bengal tiger named Richard Parker.

books.title: And Then There Were None
books.author: Agatha Christie
books.description: First, there were ten—a curious assortment of strangers summoned as weekend guests to a little private island off the coast of Devon. Their host, an eccentric millionaire unknown to all of them, is nowhere to be found. All that the guests have in common is a wicked past they're unwilling to reveal—and a secret that will seal their fate. For each has been marked for murder.

books.title: Gone Girl
books.author: Gillian Flynn
books.description: On a warm summer morning in North Carthage, Missouri, it is Nick and Amy Dunne’s fifth wedding anniversary. Presents are being wrapped and reservations are being made when Nick’s clever and beautiful wife disappears from their rented McMansion on the Mississippi River.
